note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Style-guides
body:
These are my own personal style guides for writing CSS, JavaScript, HTML, PHP, Ruby.

Feel free to take the bits you like and/or modify to your own style.

These aren't 'righteous' guides. If there is anything here you don't like, then don't worry. I'm not forcing you to play along.
